help_document.overview: Loading data from the GetExpression results set into Cytoscape is done via 3 Java Web starts. After clicking on the Cytoscape link a new page will be presented with 4 links. Each link will start a java program that can interact and extent Cytoscape

summary.name: Boss Link
summary.description: The Gaggle Boss is a program that will show all the running programs that can interact with one another.

summary.name: Network Link
summary.description: Will Start Cytoscape and load up an expression network. Each diamond node represents a condition. Genes are represented as circular nodes

summary.name: DataMatrixViewer
summary.description: This will launch the Data Matrix Viewer (DMV) which will load and display all the expression data

summary.name: Go Back to the Pipeline Overview
summary.description: Go Back to the Pipeline Overview
